name: twinscan2bsml
description: convert twinscan GTF output to BSML

options.description: Input file file from a twinscan run. -i, --input_list, will take in a list of input files, all of which will be stored in a single output bsml.
Output BSML file (will be created, must not exist)
Project ID. Used in creating feature ids.
Needed to create a Seq-data-import element referencing this path.
Version string to be used as value for the analysis attribute 'programversion'
Sourcename string to be used as value for the analysis attribute 'sourcename' Due to a silly hack in analysis2bsml.pl, you might need to put /dummy/dir at the end of it.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
